title: Generative AI on Vertex AI - Prompt and image attribute guide
abstract:
# Generative AI on Vertex AI - Prompt and image attribute guide
| 0          | 1                |
|:-----------------------------------------|:--------------------------------------------------------------|
| Prompt: A close-up photo of coffee beans | Prompt: A photo of a bag of coffee beans taken from far away |
content:
## Documentation access
This feature and documentation are available to approved users. For information about requesting access, see the [Imagen on Vertex AI overview](/vertex-ai/generative-ai/docs/image/overview) .
## What's next
- View videos describing Vertex AI foundation models including Imagen, the text-to-image foundation model that lets you generate and edit images:- [Introduction to foundation models on Google Cloud](https://youtu.be/YCZ6nwGnL4o) 
- [Imagen on Vertex AI: Create and edit images from text](https://youtu.be/pN-RTBq6i3I) 
- Read blog posts describing Imagen on Vertex AI and Generative AI on Vertex AI:- [Imagen 2 on Vertex AI is now generally available](/blog/products/ai-machine-learning/imagen-2-on-vertex-ai-is-now-generally-available) 
- [Gemini, Google's most capable model, is now available on Vertex AI](/blog/products/ai-machine-learning/gemini-support-on-vertex-ai) 
- [Announcing General Availability of Duet AI for Developers and Duet AI in Security Operations](https://cloud.google.com/blog/products/ai-machine-learning/duet-ai-for-developers-and-in-security-operations-now-ga)
